app.title: A timer test

view.html:p:
Stop Resume Restart
Show milliseconds • Timer interval: ms

The timer will start automatically. Press Stop once to stop the timer; it can be resumed by pressing the Resume button. Press Stop twice to clear the timer (the time will revert to 0.) Finally, the timer can be restarted from 0 at anytime with the Restart button. The LED indicator shows up green when the timer is running, and is grayed out otherwise. You can decide to display milliseconds or not by (un)checking the Show milliseconds checkbox. You can change the timer interval by clicking inside the number box and draggin up or down, or typing a value after having clicked in the timer box and typing enter or return (it should show a focus ring.) Note: since we rely on Javascript for timing, the timer interval is not very acurate.
